entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 p.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
